welcome_message_body: Welcome to Zacatecas, Mexico! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's colonial charm, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything this beautiful destination has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Calera Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at La Calera Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
